projects.description: A web component-driven resume website that dynamically renders a print-ready resume using a remote, schema-compliant JSON. Tailored for seamless updates and compatibility, it ensures effortless customization and consistent formatting across all devices.
highlights: Dynamic rendering of resumes from remote, schema-compliant JSON for consistent and structured content.
Print-ready, responsive design using TailwindCSS and Web Components for professional presentation.
Seamless integration, enabling quick updates while maintaining content validity against the JSON schema.
